sentences: Artists like Isabelle Antena, Ted Milton and Michael Franti cooperated in the production of this CD.
As such, they appeared multiple times at Rock Werchter, I Love Techno, Ten Days Off, Pukkelpop, Gentse Feesten, Dour Festival, Zeverrock and many other festivals.
Buscemi also produced the soundtrack of the Belgian drama series De Rodenburgs, a TV series about the intrigues between two rich families in Kortrijk.
In the summer of 2011 he scored a hit (O Sarracino) together with Rocco Granata.
